history.content:
Course BioE 192 is in search of a 50% GSI for Fall.  Deadline to apply is this Friday at 8AM. Undergrads, especially seniors, are encouraged to apply. See description below:

BioE 192: Senior Bioengineering Design & Capstone Projects (Fall 2018): An engineering design focused course that allows senior BioE undergraduates to tackle medically relevant ‘unmet needs’ using the engineering design process.  Each team works with a ‘clinical client’ at UCSF, and moves their design concept all the way through prototyping & testing.  As a GSI, you will mentor and challenge the undergraduates, as well as learn about electronic prototyping, solid modeling & rapid prototyping, project management, lecture- and active learning-based instruction, and gain exposure to intellectual property and FDA regulatory basics.  If you have completed a capstone project in your undergraduate studies (any discipline), that is a bonus.  We seek a dynamic, self-motivated GSI to be a member of our teaching team. 

If interested, please send your CV to Kristin (kaolson@berkeley.edu) no later than 8:00 am on Friday, July 27.
Please feel free to direct questions my way as well.
Thank you!
Kristin
history.subject: BioE 192 GSI position available; deadline this FRIDAY at 8AM
